sentences.sentence: This obliquity creates the terrestrial seasonality so important to the evolution and diversity of life.
sentences.translation: 这种倾斜创造了对生命进化和多样性如此重要的陆地季节性。

sentences.sentence: The most important impact of this increased seasonality may very well have been its effect on the distribution of plants.
sentences.translation: 这种季节性增加的最重要的影响，很可能是它对植物分布的影响。

sentences.sentence: Mars, in contrast, has a wildly oscillating tilt and chaotic seasonality, while Venus, rotating slowly backward, has virtually no seasonality at all.
sentences.translation: 相比之下，火星有着剧烈的倾斜和混乱的季节性，而金星则缓慢地向后旋转，几乎没有实质上的任何季节性。
